Package controller

package controller
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AppointmentsAddController
    Class and methods control the appointments add screen.
    AppointmentsController
    Class and method to control main appointments screen, display appointment by month or week, allow users to choose to delete an appointment.
    AppointmentsEditController
    Class to control editing and saving appointment data.
    CustomerAddController
    Class to control adding and saving new customer data.
    CustomerEditController
    Class to control editing and saving customer data.
    CustomersController
    Class and method to view customer data and delete or access menus to edit or add new.
    LoginController
    Class and methods to verify login, update login log, and set locale/language based on operating system settings.
    MainMenuController
    Class and method to control main menu with access to appointments, customers, and reports screens.
    ReportsController
